@steeevg Are we calling French crêpes, "British pancakes"? Because I think crêpes and American pancakes cannot be compared as for-like items. They are both wonderful and magical and I won't let you force me to choose. This is the only contribution we Brits made to pancakes. For shame!!! https://t.co/NrBDryrF8G
